InitialFeedbackHistory:
04/04/2023
Data: will you collect any additional datasets, eg notes, calculations or files with results? For more information about what is considered data in a DMP see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-standards
Documentation: please explain which documentation you will add, are these for example readme files, explanatory lines in code?
Storage: please explain here where you store your software packages during the project, will you use gitlab, consult the storage guide to help you choose between the different KU Leuven solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. 
Sharing: you can also consider using RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr), the institutional repository of KU Leuven
label: good with suggestions
